page.title: 10Mill Green
page.content: {Mrs Batchelor} About 40 residents at the moment, room for about 3 more. They have various facilities for the residents. They have 4 lounges with a tele in each, 4 bathrooms, 1 diningroom where everybody goes.Also in one of the lounges there is a piano. There is also an average sized garden. The residents have visitors at any time of the day, 2 or 3 never have visitors. {Miss Haynes }was a house keeper in her younger days. Miss Haynes has been at Mill Green for nine years she is now 85 years old. {Mrs Brownlowe }has been at Mill Green for 3 years.She was manageress at a drapers shop. she was married and had 1 son,65.She has 2 great grand children,4 great great grand children. Mrs Brownlowe is now 87 yrs old.
